name: GemTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open gem trivia”
”Alexa, start gem trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gem trivia
des:
Gather your friends and learn about the properties of gemstones as you play Gem trivia. Do you have rocks in your head? Are you brilliant like a crystal? Only one can be crowned gem genius. Ask Alexa to open Gem Trivia. She will walk you through the directions and quizzes you on gem trivia topics. Provide the answer and try to achieve a high score. Up to four people can play.
Charmed in Company LLP is the oldest Mystical Metaphysical shoppe in NJ. We created this game as a way to learn about gems and their properties in an entertaining way. Good luck! Check out out other skills in the lifestyles, self improvement section.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
